attributes.action: That Captain Tom Moore be recognised for his charitable work.
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moore has captured the spirit of the country, at his advanced age, having served his country before he has stepped forward again and taken the decision to raise funds to tackle the viris crisis. An inspiration to us all, I make a recommendation that Captain Moore is equally recognised for his chritable work.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore has inspired the nation by his charitable efforts during the recent virus crisis. In times of need, individuals emerge who capture and lift our spirits, Captain Moore is one such individual.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
